description:
Big Sis Sho has come around again, but Chipmunk manages to slip away. Grumbling while he walks, he runs into Bonobono and Raccoon. Raccoon has never met Chipmunk`s big sister and demands to meet her, so Chipmunk takes them to see Big Sis Sho...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: シマリスくんのわかったこと
